GDPR Compliance Statement

At [company name], we take the protection of your personal data seriously. This statement outlines our commitment to GDPR compliance and provides you with information about how we collect, process, and protect your personal data.

What personal data do we collect and why?

We collect personal data from you when you fill out our contact form or sign up for our newsletter. This data may include your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide us. We collect this data for the purpose of responding to your inquiries or sending you updates about our products and services.

What is the legal basis for processing personal data?

We process your personal data based on your consent, which you provide by filling out our contact form or signing up for our newsletter. You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time.

How long do we store personal data?

We store your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, or as required by law. If you withdraw your consent, we will delete your personal data within [number of days].

Who do we share personal data with?

We may share your personal data with third-party service providers who help us manage our website or provide other services to us. We have contracts in place with these service providers to ensure they comply with GDPR requirements.

What are your rights under GDPR?

Under GDPR, you have the right to access, rectify, erase, or restrict the processing of your personal data. You also have the right to data portability and the right to object to the processing of your personal data. To exercise any of these rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer at [contact information].

Who is our Data Protection Officer?

Our Data Protection Officer is [name], who can be reached at [contact information]. If you have any questions or concerns about how we collect, process, or protect your personal data, please contact our Data Protection Officer.
